Question: H.C.C International Limited. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
H.C.C International Limited

High Throughput Reflow Oven

- Easily dispenses fine pitch components
- ±25µm positioning accuracy
- 2024 IPC Certifications Schedule available
